mn80:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn80:2.1: Atha kho vekhanaso paribbajako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn80:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam atthasi.
mn80:2.3: Ekamantam thito kho vekhanaso paribbajako bhagavato santike udanam udanesi:
mn80:2.8: “Yasma, bho gotama, vanna anno vanno uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi so paramo vanno”ti.
mn80:2.9: “Katamo pana so, kaccana, vanno yasma vanna anno vanno uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi”ti?
mn80:2.10: “Yasma, bho gotama, vanna anno vanno uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi so paramo vanno”ti.
mn80:3.2: ‘yasma, bho gotama, vanna anno vanno uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi so paramo vanno’ti vadesi, tanca vannam na pannapesi.
mn80:3.4: ‘aham ya imasmim janapade janapadakalyani, tam icchami tam kamemi’ti.
mn80:3.6: ‘ambho purisa, yam tvam janapadakalyanim icchasi kamesi, janasi tam janapadakalyanim—khattiyi va brahmani va vessi va suddi va’ti?
mn80:3.9: ‘ambho purisa, yam tvam janapadakalyanim icchasi kamesi, janasi tam janapadakalyanim evamnama evangottati vati …pe… digha va rassa va majjhima va kali va sama va manguracchavi vati … amukasmim game va nigame va nagare va’ti?
mn80:3.12: ‘ambho purisa, yam tvam na janasi na passasi, tam tvam icchasi kamesi’ti?
mn80:3.15: nanu evam sante tassa purisassa appatihirakatam bhasitam sampajjati”ti?
mn80:3.16: “Addha kho, bho gotama, evam sante tassa purisassa appatihirakatam bhasitam sampajjati”ti.
mn80:3.17: “Evameva kho tvam, kaccana, ‘yasma, bho gotama, vanna anno vanno uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi so paramo vanno’ti vadesi; tanca vannam na pannapesi”ti.
mn80:4.1: “Seyyathapi, bho gotama, mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato pandukambale nikkhitto bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, evam vanno atta hoti arogo param marana”ti.
mn80:5.2: yo va mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato pandukambale nikkhitto bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo va rattandhakaratimisaya kimi khajjopanako imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:5.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, rattandhakaratimisaya kimi khajjopanako, ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:6.2: yo va rattandhakaratimisaya kimi khajjopanako, yo va rattandhakaratimisaya telappadipo, imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:6.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, rattandhakaratimisaya telappadipo, ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:7.2: yo va rattandhakaratimisaya telappadipo, yo va rattandhakaratimisaya mahaaggikkhandho, imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:7.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, rattandhakaratimisaya mahaaggikkhandho, ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:8.2: yo va rattandhakaratimisaya mahaaggikkhandho, ya va rattiya paccusasamayam viddhe vigatavalahake deve osadhitaraka, imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:8.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, rattiya paccusasamayam viddhe vigatavalahake deve osadhitaraka, ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:9.2: ya va rattiya paccusasamayam viddhe vigatavalahake deve osadhitaraka, yo va tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalahake deve abhido addharattasamayam cando, imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:9.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalahake deve abhido addharattasamayam cando, ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:10.2: yo va tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalahake deve abhido addharattasamayam cando, yo va vassanam pacchime mase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamayam suriyo, imesam ubhinnam vannanam katamo vanno abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
mn80:10.3: “Yvayam, bho gotama, vassanam pacchime mase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamayam suriyo—ayam imesam ubhinnam vannanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti.
mn80:11.1: “Ato kho te, kaccana, bahu hi bahutara deva ye imesam candimasuriyanam abha nanubhonti, tyaham pajanami.
mn80:11.3: ‘yasma vanna anno vanno uttaritaro ca panitataro ca natthi’ti.
mn80:11.4: Atha ca pana tvam, kaccana, ‘yvayam vanno kimina khajjopanakena nihinataro ca patikitthataro ca so paramo vanno’ti vadesi; tanca vannam na pannapesi.
mn80:12.3: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
mn80:12.7: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
mn80:13.1: Yam kho, kaccana, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kamasukham.
mn80:13.2: Iti kamehi kamasukham, kamasukha kamaggasukham tattha aggamakkhayati”ti.
mn80:14.1: Evam vutte, vekhanaso paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn80:14.5: ‘Kamehi, bho gotama, kamasukham, kamasukha kamaggasukham, tattha aggamakkhayati’”ti
mn80:14.6: “dujjanam kho etam, kaccana, taya annaditthikena annakhantikena annarucikena annatrayogena annatracariyakena—
mn80:14.7: kama va kamasukham va kamaggasukham va.
mn80:14.8: Ye kho te, kaccana, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta te kho etam janeyyum—
mn80:14.9: kama va kamasukham va kamaggasukham va”ti.
mn80:15.1: Evam vutte, vekhanaso paribbajako kupito anattamano bhagavantamyeva khumsento bhagavantamyeva vambhento bhagavantamyeva vadamano:
mn80:15.3: “evameva panidhekacce samanabrahmana ajananta pubbantam, apassanta aparantam atha ca pana
mn80:15.4: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati—pajanama’ti—patijananti.
mn80:15.5: Tesamidam bhasitam hassakamyeva sampajjati, namakamyeva sampajjati, rittakamyeva sampajjati, tucchakamyeva sampajjati”ti.
mn80:16.1: “Ye kho te, kaccana, samanabrahmana ajananta pubbantam, apassanta aparantam,
mn80:16.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati—pajanama’ti—patijananti;
mn80:16.4: Api ca, kaccana, titthatu pubbanto, titthatu aparanto.
mn80:16.5: Etu vinnu puriso asatho amayavi ujujatiko, ahamanusasami aham dhammam desemi.
mn80:16.6: Yathanusittham tatha patipajjamano nacirasseva samanneva nassati samam dakkhiti—
mn80:16.7: evam kira samma bandhana vippamokkho hoti, yadidam avijja bandhana.
mn80:16.8: Seyyathapi, kaccana, daharo kumaro mando uttanaseyyako kanthapancamehi bandhanehi baddho assa suttabandhanehi;
mn80:16.9: tassa vuddhimanvaya indriyanam paripakamanvaya tani bandhanani mucceyyum;
mn80:16.10: so mokkhomhiti kho janeyya no ca bandhanam.
mn80:16.11: Evameva kho, kaccana, etu vinnu puriso asatho amayavi ujujatiko, ahamanusasami, aham dhammam desemi;
mn80:16.12: yathanusittham tatha patipajjamano nacirasseva samanneva nassati, samam dakkhiti:
mn80:16.13: ‘evam kira samma bandhana vippamokkho hoti, yadidam avijja bandhana’”ti.
mn80:17.1: Evam vutte, vekhanaso paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn80:17.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
